meaningMnemonic: The kanji and the radical are the same, so remembering the meaning of this kanji is as simple as making sure you know the radical for <radical>towel</radical> first! If you know the radical, you know this kanji means <kanji>towel</kanji> as well.
readingMnemonic: You know who loves <kanji>towel</kanji>s? The <reading>Kin</reading>g (きん) of England. He loves towels so much that he went around and put きん on every towel in the land, so you think of him whenever you use one.
